meanings.definition: Resembling a barn in appearance or structure.
meanings.sent1: The old farmhouse had a barnlike feel with its weathered wood and large doors.
meanings.sent2: The new storage shed was built with a barnlike design, complete with a pitched roof.
meanings.sent3: The barnlike shed was so cozy that the chickens started roosting in there instead of the coop!
meanings.sent4: The barnlike building stood out in the industrial area, a rustic gem among the steel structures.
meanings.sent5: The barnlike structure loomed over the fields, a beacon of rural charm.

meanings.definition: Having the characteristics or qualities of a barn.
meanings.sent1: The red paint and wooden beams gave the house a barnlike appearance.
meanings.sent2: The sturdy tables and simple decor in the restaurant created a barnlike atmosphere.
meanings.sent3: The barnlike door creaked loudly every time someone entered, adding to the charm.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed in the barnlike room, filling it with warmth and joy.
meanings.sent5: The barnlike structure provided a sense of comfort and familiarity in the bustling city.
